about_the_game:
Includes one simple quest where you can piss off, pester, and annoy a Nazi relentlessly. Repeatedly.

To retrieve this quest, go to the Church of Humanity's Right at the San Diego Convention Center. The guest of dishonor also shows up outside if you are involved in one of the Church of Humanity quests.
detailed_description:
Includes one simple quest where you can piss off, pester, and annoy a Nazi relentlessly. Repeatedly.

To retrieve this quest, go to the Church of Humanity's Right at the San Diego Convention Center. The guest of dishonor also shows up outside if you are involved in one of the Church of Humanity quests.
